creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
inscription: left: 自摺　東京拾二題　昭和三年作　落合徳川ぼたん園 {Jizuri, Tōkyō jūnidai, Shōwa sannen saku, Ochiai Tokugawa botan-en} | bottom, in pencil: Tokugawa Peoney Garden | Hiroshi Yoshida
markings: LLC, red artist's seal A: 博 {Hiroshi}
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on silk
portfolio: Twelve Scenes of Tokyo (Tōkyō jūnidai 東京拾二題)
title: The Tokugawa Peony Garden at Ochiai
